name: Bugo
description:
Bugo is a first person shooter where you have to survive as long as you can. Destroy as many androids as possible!

Controls:

WASD = Movement

Look around = Mouse

Space= Jump/accelerate

Left Mouse Button = Shoot

Everything is made by me except for:
Menu Music(legend1060), Ambient Music(grololo), crosshair and walk/shoot animations (UE4).

I used Blender, Unreal Engine 4 and Audacity.
